SQL.LOAD: Select RI.RULE_ISSUE_ID, RI.ISSUE_ID, RI.RULE_ID, RI.EFFECTIVE, RI.EXPIRATION, I.DESCRIPTION, RI.CREATED_DATE, RI.CREATED_BY, RI.MODIFIED_DATE, RI.MODIFIED_BY From ELP_RULE_ISSUE RI Inner Join ELP_ISSUE I On RI.ISSUE_ID = I.ISSUE_ID WHERE RULE_ISSUE_ID = :rule_issue_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: Select RI.RULE_ISSUE_ID, RI.ISSUE_ID, RI.RULE_ID, RI.EFFECTIVE, RI.EXPIRATION, I.DESCRIPTION, RI.CREATED_DATE, RI.CREATED_BY, RI.MODIFIED_DATE, RI.MODIFIED_BY From ELP_RULE_ISSUE RI Inner Join ELP_ISSUE I On RI.ISSUE_ID = I.ISSUE_ID Where RULE_ID = :rule_id
SQL.LOAD_RULE_LIST: SELECT ER.issue_id, ER.rule_id, ER.effective, ER.expiration, ER.created_date, ER.created_by, ER.modified_date, ER.modified_by, ER.rule_issue_id, RL.DESCRIPTION FROM elp_rule_issue ER INNER JOIN ELP_RULE RL ON ER.RULE_ID = RL.RULE_ID WHERE issue_id = :issue_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_rule_issue SET issue_id = :issue_id, rule_id = :rule_id, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE rule_issue_id = :rule_issue_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_rule_issue ( issue_id, rule_id, effective, expiration, created_by, rule_issue_id ) VALUES ( :issue_id, :rule_id, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :rule_issue_id )
SQL.IS_CHILD: SELECT rule_issue_id FROM elp_rule_issue WHERE issue_id = :issue_id AND rule_id = :rule_id
SQL.RULES_LIST: SELECT rule_id FROM elp_rule_issue WHERE issue_id = :issue_id AND EXPIRATION > SYSDATE
